pageTitle: ISSA Sleeveless Cotton Voile Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 35in / 89cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Hand wash or dry clean. 100% cotton. Fabric: Voile. A tiny version of Andy Warhol's Elvis print gives this breezy voile dress a touch of edgy cool, while the young silhouette keeps the look effortless and light. The smocked bodice hugs the figure, and small ruffled pleats detail the skirt. Adjustable spaghetti straps and partial lining. Semi-sheer. Description Dresses > Clothing > ISSA > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer In 2006, ISSA debuted at London Fashion Week and soon became noteworthy for its vibrant, feminine style. Founded by Daniella Helayel, ISSA is now led by Chairwoman Camilla Al-Fayed and Creative Director Jamie O’Hare. The London-based brand is ever-evolving, but its defining qualities—ladylike silhouettes, bold colors, and glamour—remain in place. Today, ISSA offers separates, suiting, and outerwear, bringing the timeless appeal of ISSA clothing to the greater world of fashion. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
